references.paper_title: Ridge Regression with Over-Parametrized Two-Layer Networks Converge to Ridgelet Spectrum

references.paper_title: Ghosts in Neural Networks: Existence, Structure and Role of Infinite-Dimensional Null Space
references.reason: This paper's deep dive into the null space of neural networks informed the current work's approach to understanding the universality of deep models.

references.reason: This work expanded the theoretical framework to group convolutional neural networks, a critical step in the current paper's generalization.

references.paper_title: Joint Group Invariant Functions on Data-Parameter Domain Induce Universal Neural Networks
